00104     enum SearchOption
00105     {
00106         None = 0x0,
00107         WholeWord = 0x04,
00108         RegExp = 0x08,
00109         NativeScenes = 0x010,
00110         NativeScripts = 0x020,
00111         PoserFigures = 0x0100,
00112         PoserPoses = 0x0200,
00113         PoserProps = 0x0400,
00114         PoserHair = 0x0800,
00115         PoserFaces = 0x01000,
00116         PoserLights = 0x02000,
00117         PoserCameras = 0x04000,
00118         PoserHands = 0x08000,
00119         PoserMaterials = 0x010000,
00120         PoserScenes = 0x020000,
00121         ImportFiles = 0x0100000,
00122         AllNativeFiles = NativeScenes | NativeScripts,
00123         NoNativeFilesMask = ~AllNativeFiles,
00124         AllPoserFiles = PoserFigures | PoserPoses | PoserProps | PoserHair | PoserFaces |
00125             PoserLights | PoserCameras | PoserHands | PoserMaterials | PoserScenes,
00126         NoPoserFilesMask = ~AllPoserFiles,
00127         AllFiles = ImportFiles | AllPoserFiles | AllNativeFiles,
00128         DefaultOptions = AllFiles
00129     };
00130     Q_DECLARE_FLAGS( SearchOptions, SearchOption )
